name: Contract Bridge (Highlight Software)
overview: Highlight Software Contract Bridge is an exceptionally versatile program which enables you to play a complete game single-handedly against your Commodore 64. Coupled with sophisticated bidding and play, clarity of display and full scoring, this program also features random deals of infinite variety, the simplest possible entry of bids or plays, and great versatility. You can define your own hands, display everybody's cards, re-bit or replay any hand, or even get the computer to bid or play for you. All this and much, much more. If you play Bridge, look no further. Play against the bet there is!
